title: GPA
content: How to get 10gpa? If u get S grade in all subjects, does it mean u will get 10 gpa?

comments.body:
Please check the FAQ post, I've answered this in detail there: https://bit.ly/pesu-faq

But if you don't want to read, yes the only way to get a 10 SGPA is to get an S grade in every course, which means you need to cross 90/100 in your overall score for every course.

S grade corresponds to 10/10 points in that subject 
So getting an S in all the courses gives you an exact 10 .
